mapper.select: /* 총판 or 협력사 */ SELECT emplyr_id AS MBER_ID, user_nm AS MBER_NM, EMAIL_ADRES AS MBER_EMAIL_ADRES , MBTLNUM, b.BNK_CD, b.ACCOUNT_NUM, b.ACCOUNT_NM, c.CD_NM AS BNK_NM, d.AUTHOR_CODE, if(d.AUTHOR_CODE ='ROLE_ADMIN', '운영사', '협력사') AS AUTHOR_CODE_NM from COMTNEMPLYRINFO usr LEFT JOIN RD_BNK b ON usr.IHIDNUM = b.ESNTL_ID AND b.USE_AT ='Y' LEFT JOIN RD_CD c ON b.bnk_cd = c.cd AND c.CD_GROUP ='BANK_CD' JOIN COMTNEMPLYRSCRTYESTBS d ON usr.ESNTL_ID = d.SCRTY_DTRMN_TRGET_ID WHERE emplyr_id = #{mberId}
SELECT cd AS SELECE_KEY, cd_nm AS SELECT_VALUE FROM RD_CD WHERE cd_group = #{schCdGroup} AND use_at ='Y' ORDER BY ORDE
SELECT BNK_ID, ESNTL_ID, BNK_CD, ACCOUNT_NUM, ACCOUNT_NM, USE_AT, CREAT_DT, CREAT_ID, LAST_UPDT_PNTTM, LAST_UPDUSR_ID FROM RD_BNK WHERE ESNTL_ID = #{esntlId} and USE_AT = 'Y'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RD_BNK (BNK_ID, ESNTL_ID, BNK_CD, ACCOUNT_NUM, ACCOUNT_NM, USE_AT, CREAT_DT, CREAT_ID) VALUES (#{bnkId}, #{esntlId}, #{bnkCd}, #{accountNum}, #{accountNm}, 'Y', SYSDATE(), #{creatId})
